title: Base Jungle Exits Movement
body:
Hi all this is my first post! Exciting! :D
I've noticed while exiting base at the jungle exits on a determined path, the champ does a zig-zag, feeling like you're loosing valuable distance, where they run towards one side of the gate then while passing through running to the other side. Sometimes can be really buggy. Especially noticeable with {{item:3270}} . Stand at fountain and click up near baron to determine path through said exits.
If this info helps then you're welcome :)

Also {{champion:432}} needs defence buff to be the juggernaut he should be :P But just my feels

replies.body:
If you're that fussed about losing distance/time Instead of map clicking just manually navigate nearer to your champ.

Cousin.
I take the opportunity to have a look at lanes and at shop to decide what's on my list :)
